name: Girl, Unwritten
description:
A 32 page poetry collection written by Lauren Poxton. In this first edition she battles with love, sexuality and depression.

"THIS IS HOME

Sometimes I like to lay on the ground
straight, 
flat 
and the pressure numbs my lungs,
the carpet itches against my cheek,
and I feel the noise of this house
in the walls,
the floors,
the bones.
And then I know
this is home."


All copies bought from this store come with a personalized signed note.

Beware of postage and packaging costs.
